fields.name: Group Rules
fields.value: Join by putting @OnlineEducation@chirp.social in your Mastodon search box like you would follow a person, then you can get and share posts with that address. The group is set so that no one knows if you are among the dozens of members until you comment or post. If active, stay on topic and collegial.

note: Wiki Education empowers people to contribute content to Wikipedia, Wikidata, and other Wikimedia projects for the benefit of a more informed public. https://wikiedu.org

Join the Education group. It is an open to all educators in K-16 education. :-)

Please be professional in your interactions and share resources, links, and content you are responsible for. It's OK to share content that advertises a service or offering, but don't overdo it. Please DO post your website posts, blog entries that are relevant to education. Academic topics are welcome.

fields.name: Group Manager
fields.value: @mguhlin@mastodon.education

fields.name: Group Rules
fields.value: Be nice. Please stay on topics relevant to education. Avoid controversial stuff like non-edu politics (e.g. abortion is a no-no, but teaching sex education is fine), stay professional and collegial. Have fun and please share your own publications, projects, takeaways from education work, K-16.
